channel.title: Adding somthing to a case

item.title: Adding somthing to a case
item.dc:creator: @moparclient moparclient
item.description:
@moparclient wrote:

a example… my server (project czar fixed)

i seatch for “pk” and i find this:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pk")) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //made by Musicmad441 } else { teleportToX = 3424; teleportToY = 9891; sendMessage("You teleport to the pk area, teaming is NOT aloud here!"); } } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("relax")) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //made by Musicmad441 } else { teleportToX = 2378; teleportToY = 4712; sendMessage("Relax here"); } }

so if u wnna edit your emote command u need seatch for “home”

Read full topic

item.title: Adding somthing to a case
item.dc:creator: @veki94 veki94
item.description:
@veki94 wrote:

case 169: //home tele if(teleblock) { sendMessage("You are currently teleblocked !"); } else if (!teleblock) { if(emotes == 0) { if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) { sendMessage("You cannon teleport above level 20 wilderness."); } else { teleportToX = 3222; teleportToY = 3218; } } } else { emotes = 0; pEmote = playerSE; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;
Maybe

item.title: Adding somthing to a case
item.dc:creator: @LittleMaffia LittleMaffia
item.description:
@LittleMaffia wrote:

How can I add in this case that if a player cast on you teleblock you cant teleport away.

If tryd it aleady but I get like 100 errors.

Can some one add it to this case :

case 169: //home tele if(emotes == 0) { if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) { sendMessage("You cannon teleport above level 20 wilderness."); } else { teleportToX = 3222; teleportToY = 3218; } } } else { emotes = 0; pEmote = playerSE; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;
